chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #5

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #5
chunks.text: There are three types of list in HTML.

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #5

chunks.title: Image, Lists, and Tables in HTML ｜ Sigma Web Development Course - Tutorial #5

chunks.text: Okay.
